DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness stimulating neurological segment c8-th5 patient latent hypothyroidism . One half participant receive osteopathic manuel treatment order stimulate relevant segment , half receive treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients latent hypothyroidism show increase hormone status TSH normal hormone status fT4 . A study show osteopathic treatment positive effect symptoms patient latent hypothyroidism . The study use pain inventory instrument measure effect . In study want evaluate effectiveness treatment hormone status ( TSH , fT4 ) The intervention group receive neurological osteopathic stimulation 5 week . A parallel control group receive therapy . A follow blood screening ( TSH , fT4 ) do . The result group compare .
